show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Project Censored Show on Pacifica Radio November 29 Mickey Huff and Peter Phillips present another installment in the... <!--more--> four-hour series they produced on the 50th anniversary of the JFK Assassination.
For the hour, they interview Peter Dale Scott, author many books, including Deep Politics and the Death of JFK.
The discussion looks at the phenomenon of Deep Events, and the long view of the role of a rogue and secret US government involved in various assassinations and covert activities of the past sixty years.
From JFK to today, Deep Politics, at home and abroad.
 (This show is a rebroadcast that originally aired Friday, Nov.
22, at 1 PM Pacific time on KPFA).
